itunes:title: #238 - PART 1: The Being Boss Partnership
title: #238 - PART 1: The Being Boss Partnership
description:
In this landmark Being Boss episode, Emily and Kathleen are interviewed by Michelle Khouri about their burnout and how it led Kathleen to make the decision to sell her ownership stake of Being Boss.

Listen to Part 2 of this interview: https://beingboss.club/podcast/future-of-being-boss

Get full show notes for this episode here
